name: Convex CRV
additional_notices: Kindly be aware that liquidity provided in Automated Market Maker platforms (eg. Uniswap, Sushiswap, Balancer) can be removed (also known as rug pulling), resulting in a collapse of available liquidity. Please exercise caution when trading! This notice is NOT directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder for our users.
No active trades are found for this coin. Please contact hello@coingecko.com if you think this is an error

description.en: Convex CRV is a tokenized form of veCRV, a vote escrowed CRV token. It is revenue earning token which receives rewards from the Convex protocol and admin fees from the Curve protocol.
